name: YOYI translation services
overview:
Incepted in 2003, YOYI Translation Services Co., Ltd., certified by ATA and ISO 9001:2008 Quality System, is a multi-linguistic service supplier committed to providing our valued customers with intercultural solutions such as document translation, interpretation, website localization and offshore translation sourcing.

YOYI has successfully facilitated hundreds of high-profile international cooperation & programs with translation and interpretation services that feature our signature supreme quality.

As a Chinese company with native speakers, we bear advantaged strength in Chinese-English translation both ways. All translators serving in our company enjoy more than 10 years’ experience in this field and we have translated numerous well-sold English books.
